    Docstrings
    ImageDistances.CIEDE2000 — Type.
    CIEDE2000(metric)

    The pixel-wise CIEDE2000 color-difference formula.

    References

    Sharma, G., Wu, W., and Dalal, E. N., 2005. The CIEDE2000 color‐difference formula.

    ImageDistances.ColorMetric
    ImageDistances.Hausdorff — Type.
    Hausdorff(inner_op, outer_op)

    The generalized Hausdorff distance with inner reduction inner_op and outer reduction outer_op.

    References

    Dubuisson, M-P; Jain, A. K., 1994. A Modified Hausdorff Distance for Object-Matching.
